poem.title: Abort
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: 'Alito's speech was delivered at a conference on religious liberty in Rome hosted by the University of Notre Dame law school.' - The Guardian, 29 July 2022. 'Alito, breath, as in alito cattivo, halitosis; 'My way' Frank Si- Notre; Dame as in 'there ainâ€™t nothin like'. He was there to gloat, a tic of power not justice. He'll deliver a speech, but not the clinical Orphans bless-me-fathered under him.
